item.title: Tiziana Catena
item.description: Tiziana Catena is a Cloud Architect at TIM (Italy) in the Core Network and Automation team. She received the PhD in Information and Communication Technologies, the MSc and BSc in Telecommunication Engineering cum Laude at Sapienza Università di Roma. During the PhD, Tiziana focused on network function virtualization in software-defined network, leveraging machine learning algorithms for the optimal and dynamic placement of virtual resources on a network.
